title: Elon Musk to limit ‘block’ function on his social media platform
description: CEO of X, the company formerly known as Twitter, says the feature will remain only for direct messages.

title: Curious about that TikTok pickle sweatshirt? Here’s how to shop smart.
description: TIkTok is pushing hard for you to buy products directly from videos. Here’s how to be a savvy TikTok shopper and avoid getting scammed.
